sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
CAPTURED LIVE on KINOSCOPE!
Starring: Steve McQueen, William Shatner, Ralph Bellamy
Written by: Reginald Rose
Director: Robert Mulligan
üçïSTUDIO ONE Season 9 Episodes 20 & 21üçï
In this gripping courtroom drama, a father-and-son legal team defends a young man accused of a murder he swears he did not commit. The elder lawyer, seasoned and pragmatic, approaches the case with cautious strategy, while his son, an idealistic young attorney, passionately believes in their client‚Äôs innocence. 

TRIVIA: Studio One began as a CBS radio drama in the 1940s and was reborn as a television series in 1948. It became the longest-running one-hour dramatic anthology in television history!
